project_abstract.cdata: The Seventh Railway Project will support the Ministry of Railways' (MOR) initial efforts to implement its 30-point action statement of railway reform. The project's main objectives are to assist MOR: 1) redefine the relationship between the railway and the Government; 2) reshape the railway's organization and strengthen its internal management; 3) expand the railway's transport capacity, raise its investment efficiency, and enhance its finances; and 4) modernize the railway's technologies and bolster the efficiency and quality of its transport operations and service. To achieve these objectives, MOR formulated a series of components on policy reform and institutional development (PID), investments, and studies. PID components include: 1) railway enterprise reform; 2) railway tariff reform; and 3) labor productivity enhancement. Investments include: 1) expanding corridor capacity; 2) modernizing information systems; 3) upgrading telecommunications systems; 4) commercializing container transport; 5) enhancing environmental protection; and 6) expanding system capacity. The studies include components that will provide MOR with the technical assistance and software needed to prepare future railway projects or to develop and apply new railway technologies and management techniques.

P003571.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第七铁路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将支持铁道部初步实施其铁路行业改革30项行动声明。项目的主要目标是协助铁道部：（1）重新界定铁路部门和政府的关系；（2）重组铁路组织结构，加强其内部管理；（3）增加铁路运输能力，提高铁路投资效率，增加铁路融资；（4）实现铁路技术现代化，提高铁路运输经营和服务效率和质量。为实现这些目标，铁道部确立了一系列政策改革和制度建设内容以及投资和研究项目。政策改革和制度建设的内容包括：（1）铁路企业改革；（2）铁路收费制度改革；（3）劳动生产率提高。投资项目内容包括：（1）增加铁路干线运力；（2）信息系统现代化；（3）电信系统升级改造；（4）集装箱运输商业化；（5）加强环境保护；（6）铁路系统扩容。研究项目将给铁道部提供技术援助和软件，供其今后准备新项目或开发并应用铁路技术和管理方法。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
